dmca.title: Notice of Improper Activity and Evidence Preservation Request - hxxp://monella.net/IE
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: MSOnlineSafety03 [mailto:Internet3@Microsoft-OnlineSafety.com] 
Sent: Friday, March 30, 2007 10:54 AM
To: Abuse, EV1; DMCA Houston
Subject: Notice of Improper Activity and Evidence Preservation Request -
hxxp://monella.net/IE7.0.exe

 

* PGP Signed: 03/30/07 at 10:53:15

VIA EMAIL: 

Date: 30 March 2007 

URL address: hxxp://monella.net/IE7.0.exe 
Date of Activity: 30 March 2007 

Dear Sir or Madam, 

It has come to our attention that a website you are hosting is
transmitting malicious code without permission or authorization.

The site is located at hxxp://monella.net/IE7.0.exe and appears to be
installing trojans on victims machines. 

We are bringing this to your attention with the request that you
investigate the site and, based upon your discretion under your Terms
and Conditions, immediately take the site down to prevent the additional
distribution of malicious code which may be a crime in your country.  In
addition, please maintain and take whatever steps are necessary to
prevent the destruction of all records, including electronic records and
webserver/IIS logs, in your possession or control related to this site,
account holder or subscriber.

If you have any questions, please contact us by replying to this email.
We appreciate your prompt cooperation in this matter. Please advise us
regarding what actions you take.

 

Yours sincerely, 

Emma Rutherford 
Internet Investigator 

on behalf of Microsoft Corporation 
One Microsoft Way 
Redmond, WA 98052 
United States of America 

E-mail: internet1@microsoft-onlinesafety.com 

* MSOS Internet3 <internet3@microsoft-onlinesafety.com>
* 0x0443A1A8(L)
